message.name: ERR_FV_CONCERN_ROLE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Concern Role must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_INTAKE_APPLICATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: An Intake Application must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DUPLICATE
message.locale: The client, %1s, already exists in application case %2s.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DUPLICATE_MULTI
message.locale: The client, %1s, already exists in application cases %2s.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DUPLICATE_APPREFERENCE
message.locale: The client, %1s, already exists in the intake application, %2s.
